topic.title: Hospital Discharge Medications Section - conformance rules

section.p: The hospital discharge medications section shall contain a narrative description of the medications requested (ordered) to be administered to the patient after discharge from the hospital. It shall include entries for medication requests as described in the Entry Content Module.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="10183-2" HOSPITAL DISCHARGE MEDICATIONS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7)
